name: Outer Space (itch) (sircain)
description:
Welcome to Outer Space,

a 2D - Universe for you to explore. Fight of Pirates, Upgrade your Ship and Trade.

This game is inspired by the X Series.

Press the "O" Key to open up the Help-Menu if you need instructions on how-to-play.

This is my first game release ever so please give as much feedback as you can.

Created for the Redefine2021 GameJam with the intension to improve this game to become a full space sandbox with trading and some story missions aswell as diffrent ships to own and use with upgrade possibilities for those ships.

For now there are only two missions implemented - overscoped for the gamejam ':D
